title: need help!
body: After ban pick -> Darkness -> Reconnect -> Darkness -> Reconnect -> Darkness..........

replies.body:
I'm not really someone who can answer, but those that can are gonna need a bit more detail than that. Was it the client blacking out? or the game itself? Was it coming up with any errors or was it just stuck so you closed and reopened? 

Any detail at all that you can give will help. Submitting a support ticket is also a good idea but they can sometimes take a day or two to get back to you.
